title: Confession of Faith
verses: Romans 10:9–10 (WEB) — “If you confess with your mouth that Jesus is Lord… you will be saved.”
1 Timothy 6:12 (WEB) — “Fight the good fight of faith… and confess the good confession.”
Matthew 10:32 (WEB) — “Everyone therefore who confesses me before men, I will also confess him before my Father.”
Hebrews 4:14 (WEB) — “Let’s hold firmly to our confession.”
body: Faith speaks—Jesus is Lord. Confess Him openly, cling to His promises, and live the confession through obedience and love.
prayer: Lord Jesus, I confess You as Lord and Savior. Strengthen my faith and witness so my life aligns with my words. Amen.
